metadata.Title: CVE-2021-28963 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Shibboleth Service Provider before 3.2.1 allows content injection becausetemplate generation uses attacker-controlled parameters.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-28963` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-shib - 3.3.0+dfsg1-1
libshibsp-plugins - 3.3.0+dfsg1-1
libshibsp11 - 3.3.0+dfsg1-1
shibboleth-sp-common - 3.3.0+dfsg1-1
shibboleth-sp-utils - 3.3.0+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: shibboleth-sp package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.3.0+dfsg1-1').
